txt.en: I understand from things you have told me that the friendship of Legolas the Elf and Gimli the Dwarf is newly-bloomed, but today it seems stronger than ever and they are well-nigh inseparable.\n\nI have come to know the two of them somewhat myself during our journey across King's Gondor, and I spoke to Gimli about possibly joining the crew. He said he would think about it. I saw him waiting for the lift outside Lond Cirion a few minutes ago, so perhaps he was going down to the docks? You might still catch him there, and he may know where Legolas can be found as well.
Legolas and Gimli, the Boon Companions
